articles.title: Script and pronunciation
articles.description: Get familiar with the Mokshan language's basics that will help you study more effectively.

articles.title: The Mokshan language
articles.description: The Mokshan language is the language of the Moksha people, an ethnic group indigenous to the Volga region of Russia. Spoken by the Moksha people, the language has a rich history and a complex relationship with other languages, Uralic and non-Uralic.
